A young boy named Max lives in this village and is fascinated by the magical tree. Every day, he climbs the tree and collects the precious diamonds in his bag.
However, the villagers grow worried that the tree might be disappearing as more people visit and take the diamonds, and so they decide to protect it.
The villagers place a magical fence around the tree, and every time someone approaches, the tree turns them into ice. The boy, feeling remorse, stops collecting diamonds and vows to protect the tree.
One day, the tree notices Max's change of heart and gives him a special wish in exchange for his protection: to be able to bring his mother's love back to life.
Max's mother had passed away a year ago, and he had been heartbroken. The tree grants his wish and his mother appears before him, happy and healthy.
